summary: REQ-49 appears implemented in pdfDownload.ts via a popup-window print flow with graceful failure handling and afterprint-based closing. Two additional files (frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json) were modified despite the request to keep changes scoped to pdfDownload.ts and ClientDetailPage.tsx.

missing_requirements.reason: The provided diff for ClientDetailPage.tsx is truncated before the Export PDF action/handler, so there is no direct evidence that the filename is constructed as required and passed to downloadPDF.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified project metadata/state files unrelated to the requested functional change scope (frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraints specify keeping all other pages/features unchanged outside frontend/src/utils/pdfDownload.ts and frontend/src/pages/ClientDetailPage.tsx; these additional file modifications were not requested.
